page.title: 01RAASAY_GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: RAASAY IS A SMALL ISLAND ABOUT 15 MILES LONG AND 2 MILES IN WIDTH.THERE IS A LOT OF MOORLAND ON RAASAY.THERE IS ONE SHOP AND ONE SCHOOL ON THE ISLANDAND THE POPULATION IS ABOUT 150.THERE IS ALSO AN OUTDOOR CENTRE IN WHICH YOU DO LOTS OF OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES.TO GET ON AND OF THE ISLAND YOU HAVE TO TRAVEL BY BOAT.IN THE NORTH OF RAASAY THERE IS AN OLD RUINED CASTLEIT IS CALLED BROCHEL CASTLE.THERE IS A FEW KINDS OF WILD ANIMALS ON RAASAY,THE DEER,RABBIT AND FOX.THERE IS ALSO A FARM HERE,IT SELLS CREAM AND MILK.THERE USED TO BE AN OLD IRON ORE MINE WHICH HAD A RAILWAY ON RAASAY WHICH IS NOW IN RUINS.THE ONLY WAY TO TRAVEL AROUND THE ISLAND IS TO WALK OR GO BY CAR IF YOU HAVE ONE.THERE ARE NO BUSES OR TRAINS NOW.
